<template>
    <v-form>
        <v-card
            class="mt-3 mx-3"
            flat
            tile
            outlined>
            <v-card-title>{{ phase.name }}
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-menu
                    offset-y>
                    <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                        <v-btn
                            class="black--text text-capitalize"
                            icon
                            v-bind="attrs"
                            v-on="on">
                            <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
                        </v-btn>
                    </template>

                    <v-list>
                        <v-list-item
                            v-for="(item, index) in menuItems"
                            :key="index"
                            @click="menuActionClick(index)">
                            <v-list-item-title>{{ item.text }}</v-list-item-title>
                        </v-list-item>
                    </v-list>
                </v-menu>
            </v-card-title>

            <v-card-title>
                <v-row>
                    <v-col md="4" sm="12" class="mt-3 px-2">
                        <v-text-field
                            v-model="phase.name"
                            class="rounded-0"
                            label="Name"
                            :readonly="locked"
                            dense
                            outlined>
                        </v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col md="2" sm="12" class="mt-3 px-2">
                        <v-text-field
                            v-model="phase.start_date"
                            class="rounded-0"
                            label="Start Date"
                            :readonly="locked"
                            dense
                            outlined>
                        </v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col md="2" sm="12" class="mt-3 px-2">
                        <v-text-field
                            v-model="phase.end_date"
                            class="rounded-0"
                            label="End Date"
                            :readonly="locked"
                            dense
                            outlined>
                        </v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col md="2" sm="12" class="mt-3 px-2">
                        <v-text-field
                            v-model="phase.budget"
                            label="Budget"
                            hide-details
                            :readonly="locked"
                            dense
                            class="rounded-0"
                            outlined>
                        </v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col md="2" sm="12" class="mt-3 px-2">
                        <v-checkbox
                            v-model="phase.auto_allocate"
                            label="Autoallocate?"
                            :readonly="locked"
                            dense
                            color="secondary">
                        </v-checkbox>
                    </v-col>
                </v-row>
            </v-card-title>
            <v-card-text class="py-1">
                <v-row>
                    <v-col md="12" sm="12" class="pb-2 px-2">
                        <v-text-field
                            v-model="phase.description"
                            class="rounded-0"
                            label="Description"
                            hide-details
                            :readonly="locked"
                            dense
                            outlined>
                        </v-text-field>
                    </v-col>
                </v-row>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions v-if="!locked">
                <v-btn
                    class="ml-2 error rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                    depressed
                    @click="confirmDeletePhase">
                    Delete
                </v-btn>
                <ConfirmDialog ref="confirm" />
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn
                    class="grey lighten-1 mr-3 rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                    light
                    depressed
                    @click="show = false">
                    Cancel
                </v-btn>
                <v-btn
                    class="mr-3 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                    depressed
                    :disabled="!valid"
                    @click="save">
                    Save
                </v-btn>
                <v-btn
                    class="mr-3 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                    depressed
                    v-if="isEdit"
                    :disabled="!valid">
                    Copy
                </v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>
import ConfirmDialog from '@/components/dialogs/ConfirmDialog'

export default {
    name: 'PhaseCard',
    props: {
        phase: Object,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            locked: true,
            menuItems: [
                { text: "Add Phase", click() { this.$emit("open-createphase-dialog"); } },
                { text: "Edit Phase", click() { this.locked = false } },
                { text: "Delete Phase", click() { this.$emit("open-deletephase-dialog"); } },
                { text: "Hide Phase", click() { this.$emit("hide-phase-card"); } },
            ],
        }
    },
    methods: {
        menuActionClick(index) {
            // this.menuItems[index].hasOwnProperty('click') ? console.log('has click: ', this.menuItems[index].text) :
            //     console.log('no click: ', this.menuItems[index].text)
            // console.log(this.menuItems[index].action)
            this.menuItems[index].click.call(this);
        },
        openEditPhaseDialog(phase) {
            this.$emit("open-editphase-dialog", phase);
        },
    },
}
</script>
